CVE-2024-7963
(6.4 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.00%

updated 2024-10-09T03:32:20

2 posts

The CMSMasters Content Composer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's multiple shortcodes in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages

AAKL at 2024-10-08T17:00:39.658Z ##

Wordfence #WordPress plugin advisories: Pending: CMSMasters Content Composer Authenticated (Contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting via Shortcode CVE-2024-7963 https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2024-7963

Smart Post Show Authenticated (Editor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting via Pagination Color - CVE-2024-8187 (medium severity) https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/wordpress-plugins/post-carousel/smart-post-show-300-authenticated-editor-stored-cross-site-scripting-via-pagination-color #cybersecurity #infosec

##
AAKL@infosec.exchange at 2024-10-08T17:00:39.000Z ##

Smart Post Show Authenticated (Editor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting via Pagination Color - CVE-2024-8187 (medium severity) https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/wordpress-plugins/post-carousel/smart-post-show-300-authenticated-editor-stored-cross-site-scripting-via-pagination-color #cybersecurity #infosec

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T17:45:06.476Z ##

CISA: CISA Adds Three Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog
Hot off the press! CISA dun goofed and added the following to the KEV Catalog prematurely:

  • CVE-2024-43047 (7.8 high) Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Use-After-Free Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-43573 (6.5 medium) Microsoft Windows MSHTML Platform Spoofing Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-43572 (7.8 high) Microsoft Management Console Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

#cisa #cisakev #kev #knownexploitedvulnerabilitiescatalog #vulnerability #eitw #activeexploitation

##
jbhall56 at 2024-10-08T11:44:02.977Z ##

The high-severity vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2024-43047 (CVSS score: 7.8), has been described as a user-after-free bug in the Digital Signal Processor (DSP) Service that could lead to "memory corruption while maintaining memory maps of HLOS memory." https://thehackernews.com/2024/10/qualcomm-urges-oems-to-patch-critical.html

##
patchnow24x7 at 2024-10-08T07:46:09.593Z ##

CVE-2024-43047 : Qualcomm Patches a zero-day vulnerability in its Digital Signal Processor Service along with a Critical Memory corruption vulnerability with CVE-2024-33066 in its WLAN resource manager.

Advisory:
https://docs.qualcomm.com/product/publicresources/securitybulletin/october-2024-bulletin.html

iulianvostrut@mastodon.social at 2024-10-08T04:24:11.000Z ##

Qualcomm has released critical security updates, including a patch for CVE-2024-43047a, actively exploited in the wild. Urging OEMs to deploy the update ASAP. Stay vigilant and prioritize cybersecurity measures to safeguard your systems. #cybersecurity #infosec

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-07T17:23:28.461Z ##

Qualcomm exploited zero-day: October 2024 Security Bulletin
CVE-2024-43047 (7.8 high, disclosed today 07 October 2024) Use After Free in DSP Service; Memory corruption while maintaining memory maps of HLOS memory.

There are indications from Google Threat Analysis Group that CVE-2024-43047 may be under limited, targeted exploitation.

Seth Jenkins-Google Project Zero & Conghui Wang & Amnesty International Security Lab confirming in-the-wild activity. 7/29/2024

#zeroday #eitw #vulnerability #activeexploitation #CVE_2024_43047 #qualcomm #spyware #cve

Vendor: Microsoft
Product: Windows
Date Added: 2024-10-08
Vulnerability: Microsoft Windows Management Console Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T17:45:06.476Z ##

CISA: CISA Adds Three Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog
Hot off the press! CISA dun goofed and added the following to the KEV Catalog prematurely:

  • CVE-2024-43047 (7.8 high) Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Use-After-Free Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-43573 (6.5 medium) Microsoft Windows MSHTML Platform Spoofing Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-43572 (7.8 high) Microsoft Management Console Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

#cisa #cisakev #kev #knownexploitedvulnerabilitiescatalog #vulnerability #eitw #activeexploitation

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T17:41:57.817Z ##

Happy #PatchTuesday from Microsoft: 5 ZERO-DAYS (2 exploited, all of them publicly disclosed)

  • CVE-2024-43573 (6.5 medium) Microsoft Windows MSHTML Platform Spoofing Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED, EXPLOITED)
  • CVE-2024-43572 (7.8 high) Microsoft Management Console Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED, EXPLOITED)
  • CVE-2024-43583 (7.8 high) Winlogon Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED)
  • CVE-2024-20659 (7.1 high) Windows Hyper-V Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED)
  • CVE-2024-6197 (8.8 high) Open Source Curl Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED)

##

CVE-2024-9602(CVSS UNKNOWN)

EPSS: 0.00%

updated 2024-10-09T00:31:23

2 posts

Type Confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 129.0.6668.100 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T20:08:26.030Z ##

Google Chrome security advisory: Stable Channel Update for Desktop
New Google Chrome version 129.0.6668.100/.101 for Windows, Mac and 129.0.6668.100 for Linux includes 3 security fixes, 2 externally reported:

  • CVE-2024-9602 (high severity) Type Confusion in V8
  • CVE-2024-9603 (high severity) Type Confusion in V8

No mention of exploitation. Huzzah!

#Chrome #google #vulnerability #cve

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-10-08T20:08:26.000Z ##

New Google Chrome version 129.0.6668.100/.101 for Windows, Mac and 129.0.6668.100 for Linux includes 3 security fixes, 2 externally reported:

  • CVE-2024-9602 (high severity) Type Confusion in V8
  • CVE-2024-9603 (high severity) Type Confusion in V8

##

CVE-2024-8802
(6.1 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-10-08T21:49:10.173000

4 posts

The Clio Grow plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-10-05T23:36:10.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-8802 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-8802/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_8802

CVE-2024-20509
(5.9 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T18:45:52.513000

4 posts

A vulnerability in the Cisco AnyConnect VPN server of Cisco Meraki MX and Cisco Meraki Z Series Teleworker Gateway devices could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to hijack an AnyConnect VPN session or cause a denial of service (DoS) condition for individual users of the AnyConnect VPN service on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to weak entropy for handlers that are used du

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

#cisco #PatchTuesday #vulnerability #meraki #cve

screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.000Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium

  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)

CVE-2024-9557
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T18:37:43.163000

2 posts

A vulnerability has been found in D-Link DIR-605L 2.13B01 BETA and classified as critical. This vulnerability affects the function formSetWanPPPoE of the file /goform/formSetWanPPPoE. The manipulation of the argument webpage leads to buffer overflow. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

CVE-2024-9556
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T18:37:28.077000

4 posts

A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in D-Link DIR-605L 2.13B01 BETA. This affects the function formSetEnableWizard of the file /goform/formSetEnableWizard. The manipulation of the argument curTime leads to buffer overflow. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

##

CVE-2024-20449
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T18:34:13

2 posts

A vulnerability in Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller (NDFC) could allow an authenticated, remote attacker with low privileges to execute arbitrary code on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to improper path validation. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by using the Secure Copy Protocol (SCP) to upload malicious code to an affected device using path traversal techniques

1 repos

#search_error

screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability

  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

CVE-2024-9379
(6.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.00%

updated 2024-10-08T18:33:24

4 posts

SQL injection in the admin web console of Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to run arbitrary SQL statements.

jos1264@social.skynetcloud.site at 2024-10-08T18:45:03.000Z ##

Ivanti fixes three CSA zero-days exploited in the wild (CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380, CVE-2024-9381) https://www.helpnetsecurity.com/2024/10/08/cve-2024-9379-cve-2024-9380-cve-2024-9381/ #Don'tmiss #News

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T14:43:14.177Z ##

Happy EXPLOITED ZERO-DAY #PatchTuesday from Ivanti: October Security Update

We are aware of a limited number of customers running CSA 4.6 patch 518 and prior who have been exploited when CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380 or CVE-2024-9381 are chained with CVE-2024-8963.

  • CVE-2024-9379 (6.5 medium) SQL injection
  • CVE-2024-9380 (7.2 high) OS command injection
  • CVE-2024-9381 (7.2 high) path traversal cc: @cR0w @reverseics

#ivanti #vulnerability #eitw #activeexploitation #zeroday

##
jos1264@social.skynetcloud.site at 2024-10-08T18:45:03.000Z ##

Ivanti fixes three CSA zero-days exploited in the wild (CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380, CVE-2024-9381) https://www.helpnetsecurity.com/2024/10/08/cve-2024-9379-cve-2024-9380-cve-2024-9381/ #Don'tmiss #News

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-10-08T14:43:14.000Z ##

Happy EXPLOITED ZERO-DAY #PatchTuesday from Ivanti: October Security Update

We are aware of a limited number of customers running CSA 4.6 patch 518 and prior who have been exploited when CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380 or CVE-2024-9381 are chained with CVE-2024-8963.

  • CVE-2024-9379 (6.5 medium) SQL injection
  • CVE-2024-9380 (7.2 high) OS command injection
  • CVE-2024-9381 (7.2 high) path traversal cc: @cR0w @reverseics

CVE-2024-43488
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.00%

updated 2024-10-08T18:33:24

2 posts

Missing authentication for critical function in Visual Studio Code extension for Arduino allows an unauthenticated attacker to perform remote code execution through network attack vector.

AAKL at 2024-10-08T17:54:41.660Z ##

@mttaggart Yeah, there's only one for Visual Studio. But clicking on the CEV, it says it's a new listing, and as you say, requires no action: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-43488. Thanks for mentioning that.

##
AAKL@infosec.exchange at 2024-10-08T17:54:41.000Z ##

@mttaggart Yeah, there's only one for Visual Studio. But clicking on the CEV, it says it's a new listing, and as you say, requires no action: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-43488. Thanks for mentioning that.

CVE-2024-9381
(7.2 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.00%

updated 2024-10-08T18:33:23

4 posts

Path traversal in Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to bypass restrictions.

jos1264@social.skynetcloud.site at 2024-10-08T18:45:03.000Z ##

Ivanti fixes three CSA zero-days exploited in the wild (CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380, CVE-2024-9381) https://www.helpnetsecurity.com/2024/10/08/cve-2024-9379-cve-2024-9380-cve-2024-9381/ #Don'tmiss #News

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T14:43:14.177Z ##

Happy EXPLOITED ZERO-DAY #PatchTuesday from Ivanti: October Security Update

We are aware of a limited number of customers running CSA 4.6 patch 518 and prior who have been exploited when CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380 or CVE-2024-9381 are chained with CVE-2024-8963.

  • CVE-2024-9379 (6.5 medium) SQL injection
  • CVE-2024-9380 (7.2 high) OS command injection
  • CVE-2024-9381 (7.2 high) path traversal cc: @cR0w @reverseics

#ivanti #vulnerability #eitw #activeexploitation #zeroday

##

Happy EXPLOITED ZERO-DAY #PatchTuesday from Ivanti: October Security Update

We are aware of a limited number of customers running CSA 4.6 patch 518 and prior who have been exploited when CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380 or CVE-2024-9381 are chained with CVE-2024-8963.

  • CVE-2024-9379 (6.5 medium) SQL injection
  • CVE-2024-9380 (7.2 high) OS command injection
  • CVE-2024-9381 (7.2 high) path traversal cc: @cR0w @reverseics

CVE-2024-20500
(7.5 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T18:27:19.347000

4 posts

A vulnerability in the Cisco AnyConnect VPN server of Cisco Meraki MX and Cisco Meraki Z Series Teleworker Gateway devices could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a DoS condition in the AnyConnect service on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to insufficient resource management when establishing TLS/SSL sessions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sendin

RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-10-03T09:35:17.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-20500 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-20500/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_20500

##
RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-10-03T09:35:17.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-20500 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-20500/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_20500

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

#cisco #PatchTuesday #vulnerability #meraki #cve

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.000Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T17:41:57.817Z ##

Happy #PatchTuesday from Microsoft: 5 ZERO-DAYS (2 exploited, all of them publicly disclosed)

  • CVE-2024-43573 (6.5 medium) Microsoft Windows MSHTML Platform Spoofing Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED, EXPLOITED)
  • CVE-2024-43572 (7.8 high) Microsoft Management Console Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED, EXPLOITED)
  • CVE-2024-43583 (7.8 high) Winlogon Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED)
  • CVE-2024-20659 (7.1 high) Windows Hyper-V Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED)
  • CVE-2024-6197 (8.8 high) Open Source Curl Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (PUBLICLY DISCLOSED)

Perhaps UEFI is considered a security feature that can be bypassed?
🤔

An OS command injection vulnerability in the admin web console of Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to obtain remote code execution.

jos1264@social.skynetcloud.site at 2024-10-08T18:45:03.000Z ##

Ivanti fixes three CSA zero-days exploited in the wild (CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380, CVE-2024-9381) https://www.helpnetsecurity.com/2024/10/08/cve-2024-9379-cve-2024-9380-cve-2024-9381/ #Don'tmiss #News

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T14:43:14.177Z ##

Happy EXPLOITED ZERO-DAY #PatchTuesday from Ivanti: October Security Update

We are aware of a limited number of customers running CSA 4.6 patch 518 and prior who have been exploited when CVE-2024-9379, CVE-2024-9380 or CVE-2024-9381 are chained with CVE-2024-8963.

  • CVE-2024-9379 (6.5 medium) SQL injection
  • CVE-2024-9380 (7.2 high) OS command injection
  • CVE-2024-9381 (7.2 high) path traversal cc: @cR0w @reverseics

The WP Booking Calendar plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via admin settings in all versions up to, and including, 10.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an i

A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to obtain sensitive information from an affected device. This vulnerability is due to a lack of proper data protection mechanisms for certain configuration settings.   1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities

    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

CVE-2024-20492
(6.7 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T16:07:26.280000

2 posts

A vulnerability in the restricted shell of Cisco Expressway Series could allow an authenticated, local attacker to perform command injection attacks on the underlying operating system and elevate privileges to root. To exploit this vulnerability, the attacker must have Administrator-level credentials with read-write privileges on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to insufficient val

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium

  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability

  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

##

CVE-2024-20491
(8.6 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T15:55:08.933000

2 posts

A vulnerability in a logging function of Cisco Nexus Dashboard Insights could allow an attacker with access to a tech support file to view sensitive information. This vulnerability exists because remote controller credentials are recorded in an internal log that is stored in the tech support file. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by accessing a tech support file that is generated fr

1 repos

(6.5 MEDIUM)

updated 2024-10-08T15:33:50

4 posts

A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers could allow an authenticated, Administrator-level, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code as the root user. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker would need to have valid Administrator credentials on the affected device. &nbsp; This vulnerability is due to improper validati

  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

#cisco #PatchTuesday #vulnerability #meraki #cve

CVE-2024-20519
(6.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T15:33:50

2 posts

A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers could allow an authenticated, Administrator-level, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code as the root user. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker would need to have valid Administrator credentials on the affected device. &nbsp; This vulnerability is due to improper validati

screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

##

CVE-2024-33506
(3.3 LOW)

EPSS: 0.00%

updated 2024-10-08T15:32:55

2 posts

An exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability [CWE-200] in FortiManager 7.4.2 and below, 7.2.5 and below, 7.0.12 and below allows a remote authenticated attacker assigned to an Administrative Domain (ADOM) to access device summary of unauthorized ADOMs via crafted HTTP requests.

screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T14:35:24.476Z ##

Happy #PatchTuesday from Fortinet:

  • FG-IR-24-196 CVE-2024-45330 (7.2 high) Format String Bug in fazsvcd (EoP)
  • FG-IR-23-472 CVE-2024-33506 (3.3 low) Priviledged [sic] admin able to view device summary for device in different ADOM (info disclosure)

Note: Fortinet downplays their CVE severity by showing only the temporal score. Click on the score to get the base score. No mention of exploitation.

#fortinet #vulnerability #cve

CVE-2024-20524
(6.8 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T15:32:46

2 posts

A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers could allow an authenticated, Administrator-level, remote attacker to cause an unexpected reload of an affected device, resulting in a denial of service (DoS) condition. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker would need to have valid Administrator credentials on the affected de

1 repos

#search_error

screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

#cisco #PatchTuesday #vulnerability #meraki #cve

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities

    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability

  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)

    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

##

CVE-2024-20448
(8.6 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T15:25:47.053000

2 posts

A vulnerability in the Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller (NDFC) software, formerly Cisco Data Center Network Manager (DCNM), could allow an attacker with access to a backup file to view sensitive information. This vulnerability is due to the improper storage of sensitive information within config only and full backup files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by parsing the conte

screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

screaminggoat at 2024-10-08T14:35:24.476Z ##

Happy #PatchTuesday from Fortinet:

  • FG-IR-24-196 CVE-2024-45330 (7.2 high) Format String Bug in fazsvcd (EoP)
  • FG-IR-23-472 CVE-2024-33506 (3.3 low) Priviledged [sic] admin able to view device summary for device in different ADOM (info disclosure)

Note: Fortinet downplays their CVE severity by showing only the temporal score. Click on the score to get the base score. No mention of exploitation.

(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T14:51:59

1 posts

Schema parsing in the Java SDK of Apache Avro 1.11.3 and previous versions allows bad actors to execute arbitrary code. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.11.4 or 1.12.0, which fix this issue.

iulianvostrut@mastodon.social at 2024-10-07T09:40:04.000Z ##

Critical security flaw CVE-2024-47561 in Apache Avro SDK poses arbitrary code execution risks for large-scale data processing systems. Ensure timely patching to safeguard your infrastructure. Details: [link] #infosec #cybersecurity

(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T14:33:42.703000

4 posts

A vulnerability was found in Codezips Online Shopping Portal 1.0. It has been classified as critical. Affected is an unknown function of the file index.php. The manipulation of the argument username leads to sql injection. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

screaminggoat at 2024-10-02T16:23:45.227Z ##

Cisco security advisories:

  1. Cisco UCS B-Series, Managed C-Series, and X-Series Servers Redfish API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20365 (6.5 medium)
  2. Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20516, CVE-2024-20517, CVE-2024-20522, CVE-2024-20523 and CVE-2024-20524 (6.8 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20518, CVE-2024-20519, CVE-2024-20520 and CVE-2024-20521 (6.5 medium) Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
  3. Cisco Small Business RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20393 (8.8 high) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20470 (4.7 medium) Cisco RV340, RV340W, RV345, and RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  4. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator SSL/TLS Certificate Validation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20385 (5.9 medium)
  5. Cisco Nexus Dashboard and Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Unauthorized REST API Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20438 (6.3 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20441 (5.7 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20442 (5.4 medium) Cisco Nexus Dashboard Unauthorized REST API Endpoints Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20477 (5.4 medium) Cisco NDFC Unauthorized REST API Endpoint Vulnerability
  6. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Hosted Services Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20490 and CVE-2024-20491 both 6.3 medium
  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

(5.9 MEDIUM)

updated 2024-10-08T14:22:34.120000

2 posts

CVE-2024-20438
(5.4 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T13:54:46.450000

2 posts

A vulnerability in the REST API endpoints of Cisco NDFC could allow an authenticated, low-privileged, remote attacker to read or write files on an affected device. This vulnerability exists because of missing authorization controls on some REST API endpoints. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted API requests to an affected endpoint. A successful exploit could allow th

CVE-2024-20521
(9.1 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T13:50:57.163000

4 posts

A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Small Business RV042, RV042G, RV320, and RV325 Routers could allow an authenticated, Administrator-level, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code as the root user. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker would need to have valid Administrator credentials on the affected device. &nbsp; This vulnerability is due to improper valida

  7. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller REST API Command Injection Vulnerability CVE-2024-20444 (5.5 medium)
  8. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20449 (8.8 high)
  9. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability CVE-2024-20432 (9.9 critical) 🥵
  10. Cisco Nexus Dashboard Fabric Controller Configuration Backup Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20448 (6.3 medium)
  11. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Session Takeover and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20509 (5.8 medium)
  12. Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
    • CVE-2024-20498, CVE-2024-20499, CVE-2024-20501 (8.6 high) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20500 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20502 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN DoS Vulnerability
    • CVE-2024-20513 (5.8 medium) Cisco Meraki MX and Z Series Teleworker Gateway AnyConnect VPN Targeted DoS Vulnerability
  13. Cisco Identity Services Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability CVE-2024-20515 (6.5 medium)
  14. Cisco Expressway Series Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20492 (6.0 medium)

At a glance no mention of exploitation:

The Cisco PSIRT is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.
Neither the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) nor the Cisco Meraki Incident Response Team is aware of any malicious use of the vulnerabilities that are described in this advisory.

updated 2024-10-08T13:45:07.300000

2 posts

A vulnerability in a specific REST API endpoint of Cisco NDFC could allow an authenticated, low-privileged, remote attacker to learn sensitive information on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to insufficient authorization controls on the affected REST API endpoint. CVE-2024-9313
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-08T13:32:59

4 posts

Authd PAM module up to version 0.3.4 can allow broker-managed users to impersonate any other user managed by the same broker and perform any PAM operation with it, including authenticating as them. This is possible using tools such as `su`, `sudo` or `ssh` (and potentially others) that, so far, do not ensure that the PAM user at the end of the transaction is matching the one who initiated the tra

CVE-2024-9514

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-07T17:48:28.117000

4 posts

A vulnerability was found in D-Link DIR-605L 2.13B01 BETA. It has been declared as critical. This vulnerability affects the function formSetDomainFilter of the file /goform/formSetDomainFilter. The manipulation of the argument curTime leads to buffer overflow. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

##

CVE-2024-44204
(5.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-10-04T18:32:13

7 posts

A logic issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue is fixed in iOS 18.0.1 and iPadOS 18.0.1. A user's saved passwords may be read aloud by VoiceOver.

AAKL at 2024-10-08T16:39:39.904Z ##

The advisory includes CVE-2024-44204 and CVE-2024-44207.

Cyble: #Apple Issues Urgent Security Advisory for #iOS and iPadOS Vulnerabilities https://cyble.com/blog/apple-issues-urgent-security-advisory-for-ios-and-ipados-vulnerabilities/ @aucyble #cybersecurity #infosec

##
aapl@mastodon.ml at 2024-10-04T08:20:02.000Z ##

🔓 Помимо исправления багов и ошибок, в свежих обновлениях iOS/iPadOS 18.0.1 также закрыли уязвимости

В документе (https://support.apple.com/en-us/121373) 👨‍🔧 Поддержки были перечислены две уязвимости под кодовыми номерами: CVE-2024-44207 и CVE-2024-44204.
Первый баг касался работы индикатора микрофона в 💬 iMessage на iPhone 16 при записи голосового сообщения – существовал риск обхода его активации на несколько секунд. Вторая уязвимость уже присутствовала на всех моделях, на которых работает система и заключалась в том, что сохранённые 🔑 пароли пользователя могли быть прочитаны вслух с помощью 🔊 VoiceOver без запроса владельца устройства.

Компания поблагодарила нашедших эти недочёты, даже если они сохранили анонимность.

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-04T00:02:55.790Z ##

@lyceris I paraphrased both for brevity and convenience but they're bad audio security risks:

CVE-2024-44207 in Media Session: Audio messages in Messages may be able to capture a few seconds of audio before the microphone indicator is activated

CVE-2024-44204 A logic issue in Passwords: A user's saved passwords may be read aloud by VoiceOver

##
screaminggoat at 2024-10-03T23:29:55.365Z ##

Apple security advisories: About the security content of iOS 18.0.1 and iPadOS 18.0.1
2 security fixes: CVE-2024-44207 Audio messages captures audio before microphone indicator is activated, and CVE-2024-44204 VoiceOver might read a user's saved passwords OUT LOUD, WHAT THE FUCK

macOS Sequoia 15.0.1, watchOS 11.0.1, visionOS 2.0.1, Safari 18.0.1 were also updated but have no published CVEs.

#apple #vulnerability #CVE

CVE-2017-10271
(7.5 HIGH)

EPSS: 97.16%

updated 2024-10-04T18:31:09

2 posts

Vulnerability in the Oracle WebLogic Server component of Oracle Fusion Middleware (subcomponent: WLS Security). Supported versions that are affected are 10.3.6.0.0, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.1.0 and 12.2.1.2.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via T3 to compromise Oracle WebLogic Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of

Nuclei template
